name: Vessels 154: ‘FLATLINE’
description:
NAME: Kasper 
AGE: 35 
CALL SIGN: "Flatline" 
MOTTO: "Dying's not so bad..." 

DESCRIPTION: Asian woman, hair up so as to not interfere with her work, an assortment of geometric face/neck tattoos that speak to her life experiences BIO (of sorts): When she entered the bar, you could feel it. It wasn’t her appearance, it wasn’t how she acted; there was just something “other” about her, an aura (if you believe in that sort of thing). Drinks were on the house for what she’d done for the people around here, but she always insisted on paying. Before she was the captain of the “K”, she had stood at the helm of the “Ragnarok”. If you’re from these parts, that’s all that needs to be said. If you’re not, all you need to know is that Kasper and her crew died protecting this place after being ambushed by three rogue ships. Data from the auto-doc showed that she was dead for a full 6 minutes before being resuscitated. The rest of the “Ragnarok” weren’t as lucky. She was different after. Some say it was PTSD, but if you ask me... I don't know where she went for those 6 minutes, but something came back with her…

This piece was created as a prize for a fan fiction entry by @lokisnfts who wrote the character description which I used to create the art.
